channel.title: Changing Strength Bonuses
channel.description: The dragon claw is just way too overpowered, and I want to change the strengh bonus. The source i am using is xx-scape 525. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2009, 04:45:28 pm[/size][hr]Anyone have a clue..?

item.title: Changing Strength Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @monarchyscape monarchyscape
item.description:
@monarchyscape wrote:

I know, he said that the source owner might have added extra spec bonus… how can I make it weaker?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2009, 06:33:08 pm[/size][hr]I’ll rep if you help.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Strength Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

That isn’t the bonus, that’s for the special attack.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Strength Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @monarchyscape monarchyscape
item.description:
@monarchyscape wrote:

} if (p.getEquipment().get(3).getDefinition().getId() == 14484 && p.specialAmount >= 50) { p.faceId(p2); p.graphics(1950, 0); p.animate(10961, 0); p2.hit(meleeDamage); meleeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitMelee()); p2.hit(meleeDamage); meleeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitMelee()); p2.hit(meleeDamage); meleeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitMelee()); p2.hit(meleeDamage); p2.combatWith = p.getIndex(); p.combatDelay = getCombatDelay(p); p2.cmbResetTimer = 8; p.specialAmount -= p.getSpecialAmount(); p.usingSpecial = false; } else { p.faceId(p2); p.specialAmount -= p.getSpecialAmount(); p2.cmbResetTimer = 8; p2.combatWith = p.getIndex(); p.usingSpecial = false; p.combatDelay = getCombatDelay(p); }

What would i change?

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Strength Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Well yes Dragon claws will kill with both specs as they hit 8 times (just like a DDS). And it isn’t just the Strength bonus of the item it is also the Special Attack. 99% of all Special Attacks do extra % of damage. Go into what ever file your special attacks are, search for the Dragon Claws id, and see if the source creator added extra damage for the spec. Hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Strength Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @monarchyscape monarchyscape
item.description:
@monarchyscape wrote:

There’s item.cfg on 525’s?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2009, 05:00:14 pm[/size][hr]I’ve changed the str bonus to 5, and they’re still 1 hitting when you use both specs.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Strength Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

Pull up you item.cfg and look for you d claws code then it should be the 18th number you change to a lower number.

hope it helped,
Buddy
